y_pred = np.array([1, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1])

import numpy as np

y_true = np.array([1, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0])
y_pred = np.array([1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1])
print(recall(y_true, y_pred))
